parameters.name: EnableMicroRegistration
parameters.description:
Indicates whether to enable SAE built-in registry:

*   **true**
*   **false**

Default value: true. If you do not use the built-in registry, you can set this parameter to false to accelerate the creation of a namespace.

parameters.name: NameSpaceShortId
parameters.description: The trace ID that is used to query the details of the request.

parameters.name: NamespaceDescription
parameters.description: The message returned for the operation.
